description:
The brothers find out that Todomatsu is actually working at Sutabaa Coffee, the six try to figure out how to split four into six, and Dayon and Dekapan head north.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Todomatsu and the Five Demons / Four / Going North
Todomatsu to 5 Nin no Akuma / 4 Ko / Kita e
トド松と5人の悪魔 / 4個 / 北へ
